alert.note: Alert for Blackford; Grant; Jay; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 06 at 2:53AM EST until March 06 at 3:30AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Grant County in central Indiana... Blackford County in east central Indiana... Southern Wells County in northeastern Indiana... Western Jay County in east central Indiana... * Until 330 AM EST. * At 253 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sweetser to 6 miles northwest of Noblesville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marion, Hartford City, Gas City, Upland, Fairmount, Dunkirk, Montpelier, Jonesboro, Redkey, Sweetser, Swayzee, Pennville, Matthews, Sims, Nottingham, Fowlerton, Shamrock Lakes, Mill Grove, Herbst and Keystone. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 252 and 267. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
